text: Yara tadera dhanasampatti allahâ€Œra pathe kharaca kaâ€™re, tarapara ya tara kharaca kareche tara tara pascad'dhabana kare na krtajnatapase abad'dha karate ba aghata hanate, tadera jan'ya puraskara ache tadera prabhura darabare, kaje'i tadera upare kono bhaya ne'i, ara tara nijera anutapa'o karabe na.
